strings.Value: {n}Rudrin Skjegge looks much better than she did on your first meeting. Back then she could barely stand for the wounds she'd received fighting the golem. Now the dwarf stands proudly at attention before you in polished armor.{/n}

"Your Highness! My dear Sir Harrim, deeply respected servant of {g|Groetus}Groetus{/g}! The Skjegge clan has sent me to you to express our gratitude for everything you have done for us, and present you with this humble gift. We crafted this for Sir Harrim personally, from the metal of artifacts unmade by him." {n}Rudrin hands a small but heavy chest to Harrim and bows.{/n}

{n}Harrim frowns, trying to hide his confusion, then nods and accepts the gift.{/n} "Well... I'm glad you're all right. It's nice to see someone managed to make something useful out of those worthless scraps."
